Various bug fixes and minor updates.

Notes (translation) support has been added to the post viewer
You can now set your avatar from a post you are viewing
Login, sign up and password recovery have been made more robust and error resistant - any who had issues in the past should please try this version!
Translations updated 
Various minor bug fixes

Notes (translation) support has been added to the post viewer
You can now set your avatar from a post you are viewing
Login, sign up and password recovery have been made more robust and error resistant - any who had issues in the past should please try this version!
Translations updated 
Various minor bug fixes

Notes (translation) support has been added to the post viewer
You can now set your avatar from a post you are viewing
Login, sign up and password recovery have been made more robust and error resistant - any who had issues in the past should please try this version!
Translations updated 
Various minor bug fixes

Recommended, parent and child posts are now displayed on the post info panel.
Tag editing is now possible from the post info panel.
You can now log in with either your email or your username.

Rankings and other missing views added
Long tap to favorite
Remember me option
Bookmarks for the main menu
Threshold selector on the search screen
Several bug fixes

- Huge performance optimisations for searching and fetching posts
- Added new search filters
- Compatibility fixes for iOS 13
- Improved encryption and security: API now supports ESNI, TLS 1.3 and more secure ciphers
- Parts of the app can now be used even prior to logging in
- Certain search filter settings are now persistently stored
- Fixed issues involving searches with special characters
- Fixed issues with displaying certain wiki and tag pages
- Improved form layout in several areas
- Layout optimisations for smaller screens
- Miscellaneous bug fixes
- Bug fixes
Minor video playback enhancements
